pullRequest.title: Replace constructFrom method with cloneWithType
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
With this PR constructFrom method has been replaced to cloneWithType
Fixes #23023
Samples
The following is
map<anydata>|error sd = map<anydata>.constructFrom(payload);
is changed to:
map<anydata>|error sd = payload.cloneWithType(map<anydata>);
Check List

 Read the Contributing Guide
 Updated Change Log
 Checked Tooling Support (#)
 Added necessary tests

 Unit Tests
 Spec Conformance Tests
 Integration Tests
 Ballerina By Example Tests


 Increased Test Coverage
 Added necessary documentation

 API documentation
 Module documentation in Module.md files
 Ballerina By Examples
